channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Kitchen Composters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Responsibly dispose of your food scraps with one of these indoor, (mostly) odor-free devices.

item.title: Uber customers can now earn Delta SkyMiles from rides or deliveries

item.title: How to Responsibly Dispose of Your Electronics (2025)
item.description: Get rid of old, broken, and unused devices—even Lightning cables—without adding to the e-waste problem.

item.title: 4chan Is Dead. Its Toxic Legacy Is Everywhere
item.description: It's likely that there will never be a site like 4chan again. But everything now—from X and YouTube to global politics—seems to carry its toxic legacy...

item.title: 11 Best Nature Documentaries on Netflix, Hulu, and More (2025)
item.description: Yes, we included Planet Earth. No, Tiger King didn’t make the list.

item.title: Adaptive Computer wants to reinvent the PC with ‘vibe’ coding for non-programmers

item.title: Superpower wants to help people detect and address health issues before symptoms appear

item.title: Crowdsourced AI benchmarks have serious flaws, some experts say

item.title: Marks & Spencer confirms cybersecurity incident amid ongoing disruption
item.description: The company said it was necessary to make operational changes to protect the business.

item.title: Best Wireless Earbuds, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Ready to cut the cord? These are our favorite buds that will never, ever get tangled.
